alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Benton, northwestern Washington, southeastern Delaware and northeastern Adair Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Siloam Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Siloam Springs... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Gentry... Tontitown... Lincoln... West Siloam Springs... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Cincinnati... Johnson... Elm Springs... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
